articles.title: Mavcom urges AirAsia X to fully reimburse ticket purchasers - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: The Malaysian Aviation Commission (Mavcom) has urged AirAsia X Bhd to fully reimburse its ticket holders whose flights have been cancelled, in view of current developments where they will only receive a fraction of the ticket purchase price.
